text.__SUMMARY__: Aspergillus helicothrix is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus.
text.Further reading: Machida, edited by Masayuki; Gomi, Katsuya (2010). Aspergillus : molecular biology and genomics. Wymondham, Norfolk, UK: Caister Academic. ISBN 978-1-904-45553-0.CS1 maint: extra text: authors list (link)
